headline.main: COURT BARS TALK; Judge Byers Holds Testimony Inimical to the Nation's Interests at Spy Trial SALE TO NAZIS CHARGED Defendant Quoted as Saying Goering Thought Secret Most Important in World

lead_paragraph: Detailed testimony relating to, the famous Norden bombsignt, believed to have been this country's most jealously guarded aerial defense weapon, was barred yesterday as being "inimical to the interests of the United States" as the trial of sixteen persons accused of espionage and failure to register as agents of a foreign government continued before Judge Mortimer W. Byers and a jury in the United States District Court in Brooklyn.
abstract: ct curbs Sebold's testimony on Norden bombsight output
